titles.title: We Rest On Thee Our Shield And Our Defender

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1. We rest on Thee,
our Shield and our Defender;
We go not forth alone against the foe;
Strong in Thy strength,
safe in Thy keeping tender,
We rest on Thee,
and in Thy Name we go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
2. Yea, in Thy Name,
O Captain of salvation!
In Thy dear Name,
all other names above;
Jesus our Righteousness,
our sure Foundation,
Our Prince of glory
and our King of love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
3. We go in faith,
our own great weakness feeling,
And needing more each day
Thy grace to know;
Yet from our hearts
a song of triumph pealing;
We rest on Thee,
and in Thy Name we go.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
4. We rest on Thee,
our Shield and our Defender:
Thine is the battle,
Thine shall be the praise
When reigning in
the Kingdom of Thy splendor,
Victors, we rest with Thee,
through endless days.
